for rn the only working game is Flag wars

OFC you may now that Novoline is actully a minecraft client. 

we orginiate from bedwars also a roblox game, which is exactly like bedwars from minecraft which novoline is ment for. 
novoline client is a bedwars script but its not released or good, so it may be used to this client

if you want to check the minecraft client : https://www.novoline.wtf
its ment for minecraft version 18.0
